Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash and cash equivalents
effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents including disposal group and discontinued operations

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: issuance costs for common stock and convertible notes
payments for buy outs of noncontrolling interests in subsidiaries
proceeds from repayments of long term debt and capital securities
proceeds from repayments of secured debt
proceeds received from directors in shareholder settlement
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from convertible and other debt
proceeds from issuance of long term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance initial public offering
proceeds from issuance of common stock
proceeds from issuance of private placement
proceeds from issuance of shares under incentive and share based compensation plans including stock options
Repayment of Debt: operating cash flow related to repayment of discounted convertible notes
operating cash flow related to repayment of discounted convertible senior notes
repayments of convertible and other debt
repayments of debt and capital lease obligations

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): business combination consideration transferred equity interests issued and issuable
payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
noncash or part noncash acquisition value of assets acquired1
shares issued in connection of business combination and assumed vested awards
Capital Expenditures: payments for solar energy systems leased and to be leased
payments for solar energy systems net of sales
payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments to acquire other indefinite lived intangible assets
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from maturities prepayments and calls of available for sale securities
proceeds from sale and maturity of marketable securities
proceeds from sale maturity and collections of investments
proceeds from sale of short term investments
proceeds from sales of digital assets

Net Change in Cash: cash and cash equivalents period increase decrease
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect
increase decrease in restricted cash and cash equivalents

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in contract with customer liability
increase decrease in contract with customer liability customer deposits
increase decrease in operating lease vehicles
increase decrease in other noncurrent assets
increase decrease in other noncurrent liabilities
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
increase decrease in resale value guarantee
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
net cash provided by used in operating activities continuing operations
Other Non-Cash Items: accretion amortization of discounts and premiums investments
amortization of debt discount less capitalized interest
amortization of debt discount premium
amortization of financing costs and discounts
foreign currency transaction gain loss before tax
foreign currency transaction gain loss realized
foreign currency transaction gain loss unrealized
gain loss on digital assets
gain loss on disposition of assets1
gain loss on disposition of property
gain loss on sale of property plant equipment
gain on digital assets
gains loss on acquisition
income taxes paid
inventory write down
non cash additionally estimated fair market value of manufacturing facility
non cash estimated fair market value of manufacturing facility
noncash interest income expense and other operating activities
other noncash income expense
right of use asset obtained in exchange for finance lease liability
right of use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability
unrealized gain loss on derivatives
write off of loan origination costs

increase decrease in other operating assets and notes receivables
